display_long_description:
SWARM 2, the highly anticipated sequel to NYX's "BEST META QUEST VR GAME"  is an electrifying rogue-like shooter. 

With epic new environments, intoxicating rogue-like progression, and globally competitive leaderboards - this is what VR is really made for!


**RECLAIM A WORLD OVERRUN**

As Marv, the last surviving grapple commando, you’ll use your trusty pistol and grappling hook to battle back the Swarm and save Earth - with style! - while growing stronger and unraveling more of the story with each unique mission to the surface. [media]


**TRANSFORM INTO A LEGENDARY HERO**

With Auggie's help, harness revolutionary Shard Tech to permanently upgrade your skills. Choose among dozens of perks to find the perfect combination and turn the tide of war.[media]



**BUILT FOR REPLAYABILITY**

Every mission brings unexpected challenges as you navigate through the neon-lit ruins of Earth, now a constantly changing battleground. Each encounter with the Swarm is a unique experience, with tactics and strategies evolving to match your growing skills. [media]

**SIGNATURE SMOOTH GRAPPLING SYSTEM**

Swarm’s Signature Smooth Grappling System turns you into a dynamic pendulum; master the art of building momentum by swooping close to the ground and timing your swings to perfection.  [media]

Intense. Demanding. Exhilarating.

**This is SWARM 2.**



[media]

With epic new environments, intoxicating rogue-like progression, and globally competitive leaderboards - this is what VR is really made for!


**RECLAIM A WORLD OVERRUN**

As Marv, the last surviving grapple commando, you’ll use your trusty pistol and grappling hook to battle back the Swarm and save Earth - with style! - while growing stronger and unraveling more of the story with each unique mission to the surface. ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031569_1159677598472976_810858379197661666_n.mp4?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=dYKdqaty88IQ7kNvwG8JDlP&_nc_oc=AdmjfhwWhF_IzXrz6qmcUeMAGPWviythyfAdnpB66mPgf44ERhzakXvSKfkNQtIdYlhwTY61K2heLUVX-hPjNYQK&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=SaP--4C45bvLPWfbJk5nMg&oh=00_AfGDFeYQQkpCX0JPXGakkSpbeAWzBJAVL3W5bUPNBT-pEA&oe=68055396)

With Auggie's help, harness revolutionary Shard Tech to permanently upgrade your skills. Choose among dozens of perks to find the perfect combination and turn the tide of war.![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75439601_1283604596339092_1626885398679824555_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=IqaRYM-uEC8Q7kNvwFP8ohW&_nc_oc=AdkJtFVtjyCWnFwcAM2KgCx9LSXF9q8Rd3beCArrhvs7yOvRHmtndVU-8xT-vp8HhFu8JhHAe26io3W3i2wx2YX1&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=SaP--4C45bvLPWfbJk5nMg&oh=00_AfGiFsLh1bFtoz1bX69yGKtoORQ2LEraAHks0RZqY6dOWQ&oe=68055FAC)

Every mission brings unexpected challenges as you navigate through the neon-lit ruins of Earth, now a constantly changing battleground. Each encounter with the Swarm is a unique experience, with tactics and strategies evolving to match your growing skills. ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982547_414026104680350_1590790586923082496_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=moaBurwJj_QQ7kNvwFFh0gw&_nc_oc=AdlkzY_seepDPwlRz0M9FXf41Sv1oPpVWwwPKF1nr6RQDX5n5EOK_QWzWCljtCTqrwp34OW7JSTVtBPzQr56ysqP&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=SaP--4C45bvLPWfbJk5nMg&oh=00_AfE6lQnby_GQOU9CkVpoQEFZ5APTyyskwOvAur57AKDldA&oe=68054B32)

Swarm’s Signature Smooth Grappling System turns you into a dynamic pendulum; master the art of building momentum by swooping close to the ground and timing your swings to perfection.  ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/57569452_1204316914209794_1314769465083168968_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=rNFnhj8ylqcQ7kNvwG6gI6M&_nc_oc=AdmtiPBDiLsxQjeS7lgdmmYRVqSE113Q0Nl7Rc1u2Sb4dcIg-jeBFSZcoI4mNKRSMUkLZdHVL6rDzJnwGwrwbodl&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=SaP--4C45bvLPWfbJk5nMg&oh=00_AfFimltGoqCO5dHnXF_CxHyt6CyEgvuTXcrz9kEIRXl9kQ&oe=68054D4C)

Intense. Demanding. Exhilarating.

**This is SWARM 2.**
